title: The Signature of God / the Handwriting of God
description: Are the Scriptures truly the word of God? Can they be trusted? "Yes!" declares Bible prophecy expert Grant Jeffrey, and these two bestsellers he amasses an amazing quantity of evidence to demonstrate it. The Signature of God argues that God has indeed revealed Himself in the pages of the Bible through a staggering number of divine the incredible precision of prophecies fulfilled, ancient inscriptions that validate the Exodus events, the name of Jesus encoded in the Old Testament, and much more. In The Handwriting of God , Jeffrey unveils the truth about the controversial "Bible codes" while revealing new code discoveries hidden in the Scriptures. Throughout, he shows that though the Bible was written thousands of years ago, it still speaks reliably and authoritatively to modern man. Comprehensive and convincing, this two-in-one collection is a must-have for every concerned believer.
author: Grant R. Jeffrey
